caption: A hidden gem just off the main street. Free entry, stunning exterior, and an adjacent bookstore worth browsing. The multistory gallery features an impressive selection of French painters‚Äîthoughtful curation in an elegant space. Perfect for a quiet afternoon escape.
Excellent galley with great space and quality exhibition. Highly recommend to have a visit.

Good place to see some art without paying money. If you are like me not the ‚Äûsuper into art‚Äú person, it‚Äôs a good place to just stroll around a bit and explore the space and work of the artists. The bookshop nearby also had quite some interesting pieces.
great gallery with always beautiful artists, very calm and bright with a good smell. A fragrance specially created and imagined for this spacious place.
Amazing gallery and great exhibition on the time I visited. Will definitely come back :)
Well curated art, in a beautiful building. Highly recommended.
Mid sized, fast visiting, beautiful gallery. Take 15 minutes, go check it out, you won't regret it.  Thanks, Perrotin!
Some of the most inspiring exhibitions are at Galerie Perrotin. The Daniel Arsham exhibition is amazing

Nice location, very free to roam through the art, exhibition we saw was not the typical cliche stuff, but it had personality, concept. Book store is very nice, if you are designer or artist you surely buy something there :)
A three-floor gallery located in a beautiful neighborhood of Marais. Amazing taste for their selection of artists. Also loved the stair design and interior garden. Free entry.
Let me tell type a secret: I go often, and most of the time I prefer the building then the paintings :) this place is awesome !!
Although I didn't love the art on here this time, the space is great and the bookstore is fantastic

My favourite gallery in Paris. Just another level!
I visited my favorite artist temporary exhibition. And the place is amazing
Perfect place for people who likes art and taking pictures.
Lovely art gallery and book store. Enjoyed our time here!
Art Prints are cool but most of them are sold out instore, while it says avaliable online :(
Always an immense joy to see the works of Rothko - Hartung
Very cool gallery and very nice staff as well
Top gallery  in Paris Must to see
Currently one of my favorite places in Paris. Loved everything about this place.

a huge one, and a very impressive one loved the building and the art inside if you love contemporary art, and strolling galleries like me- must!
Love the small bookstore, there are lots of interesting art books spanned across different art genres. Went to the David Arsham gallery as well. Interesting works.
Great curated exhibitions of grand masters. Beautiful monographies and high end gallery space. The Hartung exhibition was amazing in collaboration with the Hartung-Bergmann Fondation!
great show, amazing place

Really cool place to discover some incredible art and inspiring artists. Also the entrance is free!
